extendedInfo.description: Having an issue?  Don't hesitate to send us an email to support@copy.com!Copy is the easiest way to store, protect, and share all your amazing things. With FREE storage for new accounts and competitive pricing plans, you have enough space to store virtually everything you need. And anything you save with Copy is instantly accessible on your computers, smartphones, tablet and the Copy website.App Featuresâ¢ PhotoCopy: A quick, easy way to sync your photos and videos with your Copy account     - PhotoCopy automatically uploads any photo or video you take with your device's camera for a safe and fast backup     - Enable PhotoCopy in your preferencesâ¢ On-demand access to all your filesâ¢ Easy file sharing without big attachmentsâ¢ Invite other people to join your folders for even easier sharingâ¢ Upload your photos, videos, or anything from your SD Cardâ¢ Download past versions of any file

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Working good on my HTC one but needs to improve on upload and download speeds.
reviews.author: courtney davis

reviews.title: Downloads
reviews.comment: Since last update the app downloads files in pauses taking forever note i717 jb
reviews.author: Ariel Hernandez

reviews.title: **** star application!
reviews.comment: working good,need more space hahaha..
reviews.author: Azman Ismail

reviews.title: Does NOT automatically copy pictures - feature is broken
reviews.comment: As the subject stated... Also, if the pictures is in an SD card (not in the phone memory), there is no way for you to set this in the Copy app.  I emailed the dev but it has been almost a week and no reply. I am back to DropBox.
reviews.author: Chuck St

reviews.title: Better than any other!
reviews.comment: Copy gives you so much storage space for free! Right now I have 27 GB and I don\'t even know what to do with it all! The design is excellent too, I just wish the pull out drawer was on the left instead of the right.
reviews.author: Ryan Callihan

reviews.title: Image not rotate
reviews.comment: Fine storage and app but for me big problem is that image is not automatically rotate when upload from mobile. Normal in mobile gallery image show fine but on storage its rotate wrong. Aplication and server dont read information from image. Please fix this problem.
reviews.author: Pava Pava

reviews.title: Free storage that works when you need it to.
reviews.comment: What else can I say? It does the job it says it will for free and flawlessly. Thank you.
reviews.author: Douglas Brooks

reviews.title: Love it, but...
reviews.comment: I wish it told somewhere how many files are in a folder. Any chance of that being added at some point?  Also, would be nice to choose how files are sorted.
reviews.author: Jake Larson

reviews.title: Excellence app
reviews.comment: Give u a lot of storage space
reviews.author: Muhammad Rafiq

reviews.title: download DROPBOX instead
reviews.comment: DROPBOX is way better and faster. You can even upload files to Facebook directly from Dropbox. Copy sucks! It syncs very slow!!!
reviews.author: Josef Vincent Palonpon

reviews.title: Great, but too slow!
reviews.comment: This whole service is amazing. But lately my download and upload speeds are terrible! Photocopying speeds are 40kbps and that is not how slow my internet is. It used to be so quick. I think for now I\'m gonna use flikr until this speed issue is resolved.
reviews.author: Bonviseth Lonh

reviews.title: YOU GOT IT!
reviews.comment: I would say better from Dropbox based on my experience using between on it... xD :))
reviews.author: jay bonito

reviews.title: Goodbye Dropbox & Google Drive
reviews.comment: Awesome cloud service, got a lot of free storage, app works great, quick sharing & upload, seamless photo backup...
reviews.author: Milo\305\241 Mirkovi\304\207

reviews.title: Cannot View My Recent Files
reviews.comment: I can\'t view or find the file that my friend shared to me. I can view and sync it on my PC and other devices (iOS) but never here on Android. Please fix. I need to transfer these files ASAP. THANKS!
reviews.author: Abee Co

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: The best at what it said.  But not as fast in syncing and uploading like dropbox. Dropbox is hella fast.
reviews.author: Jeo Talavera

reviews.title: Good overall
reviews.comment: Liking the app so far, but one bug. When I open a PDF in the mobile app and zoom in, it gets pixelated and doesn\'t clear up. I have to actually download the PDF. It sort of defeats the purpose.
reviews.author: King Antonius

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Lots of storage. Nice interface.
reviews.author: Dave Diehl

reviews.title: Nice but still bad
reviews.comment: Thia is really annoying. When will you let me select all and deselect all. Instead of tapping millions of times. Its easy come on....
reviews.author: yaron yudovich

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do nested directory structure download?
reviews.comment: On my desktop, the Copy app was able to upload the entire multi-level directory structure up to Copy.com.  However, the Copy Android app doesn\'t seem to be able to download the same set of multi-level directory structure to the phone.  It was only able to download the file at one level down.
reviews.author: Terry Yau

reviews.title: Upload poor
reviews.comment: I have dropbox and copy installed, dropbox uploads instantly, copy takes a lot longer and often fails.  The benefit of copy is it\'s cheaper and has a better interface.  Though all I care for is good syncing and fast syncing.  Please improve this and well be gold.
reviews.author: Nathan Vong
